column3: The panel bears information on the history of the Milalla.
(-Chapter IV-)Esteemed for their excellence in the study of electrope, the Milalla were favored by the rulers of many a nation.

(-Chapter IV-)Some among them have attempted to invoke the power of their ancient relic to return to their homeland, but their efforts were to no avail. Never again has the golden path opened that allowed their ancestors to flee to safety.
(-Chapter IV-)Eventually, the relic came to be forgotten, and some now question whether it ever actually existed.
